Job DescriptionAbout Nova BenefitsNova Benefits is on a mission to provide the best-in-class health and wellness benefits for employees in India. We envision that a vast majority of the county's population will get better access to high-quality healthcare through their employers. We are a tech-first company and believe that technology can make this vision a reality by offering a 10x better experience and fixing the broken processes for all stakeholders - Employees, Employers, HR admins, Insurers, and Healthcare providers.At Nova, we're looking to create and own the employee wellness category. In a short span of 15 months, we've built an outstanding team, achieved product-market fit, raised double-digit millions in funding and become the first company to secure an IRDAI Insurance broking license. The difference? We see ourselves in the business of improving employee happiness instead of insurance and as such more an HR tech company. Nova Benefits has been co-founded by Yash Gupta (IIT Delhi - Comp Sci, Samsung Korea) and Saransh Garg (IIT Bombay, BCG, Accel, Y-Combinator). We are backed by the top venture funds in the country - BVP, SIG, Better Capital, Titan Capital and Multiply Ventures. Key ResponsibilitiesReach out to leads (HR leaders, Finance leaders, Founders) to convey Nova’s value propositionConvert qualified leads into scheduled product demos with your Business Development LeadCollaborate with team members to share and learn from best practices.
Why you should join us#1 Flat hierarchy We are only merit oriented and don't care about your age, gender or background#2 High performance work culture We will ensure this role is career defining for you You will be working in an elite team of hand-picked individuals#3 Balanced work-life You can work flexibly accessing a supportive culture.
Stipend: 15,000/month, with an opportunity to get converted to full time based on performance

jobSkills: Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales (ICAEW)
aboutJob:
An internship is your opportunity to understand how we work and whether our culture is right for you. It’s also your chance to show us that you have the right skills and attitude to succeed here. Our internships are paid positions offering opportunities to use what you’ve learned at university on real projects.

When you join one of our Commercial and Business teams, you’ll see firsthand the expertise that goes into building and sustaining a leading energy company. Be a part of business decisions that accelerate us on the path to the next big win, working alongside the best talent to take us there.

Finance 

Help our finance team provide global support to every business area and keep key stakeholders on track for excellent financial performance. Interning here is your opportunity to understand how a global organization manages its business and finances in one of the most dynamic industries in the world. You’ll rotate through different functions and always work on live projects alongside professional accountants. If you’re looking for truly complex challenges with real impact, this internship will give you the opportunities and support to start solving them.

To apply, you must be studying for a bachelor’s degree in accounting or a professional qualification in accounting (e.g. ACCA, ICAEW, CPA etc.).

Human Resources 

If you’re interested in working in Human Resources (HR), our internships offer unique insights into a business that has succeeded by recruiting talented people and putting them in a position to succeed. You’ll contribute to innovative projects that are key to helping our people do great work. You’ll work across the business and collaborate with different areas giving you a greater understanding of the role of HR in a global business and where your skills could make a difference.

To apply, you must be studying for a bachelor’s or master’s degree in an HR-related discipline.

Supply Chain 

You’ll work on a varied range of projects to understand how we manage our complex, international supply chain and get the essential items our people need in the right place at the right time. It’s an important part of any business but especially ours. The experience you gain will help you progress in an exciting supply chain career in an international environment.

We have opportunities many areas including but not limited to Procurement, Sourcing, Logistic, Material Management, Supply Planning, Warehouse Management, and Facility Management

To apply, you must be studying for a bachelor’s or master’s degree in supply chain management, industrial distribution, business administration, engineering, or management.

Company Overview:At DexyAI, we're revolutionizing the way businesses connect with potential clients by creating AI agents. By automating hyper-personalized outreach via Email & LinkedIn, DexyAI handles everything from responding to queries and managing objections to setting up meetings on your calendar.Learn more at https://meetdexy.ai
The Opportunity:This is not just an internship, it's a chance to be part of Dexy AI's 0-1 journey. You’ll work directly with the founder, diving deep into the intricacies of building a product, validating it with early customers, and shaping the go-to-market (GTM) strategy. It’s a role for someone eager to see the inner workings of a startup as it navigates its initial steps towards product-market fit.
Why You’ll Love This Role:Immersive Learning Experience: Understand what it takes to build and refine a product from the ground up.High-Impact Work: Contribute directly to the company’s efforts in acquiring early customers and establishing the foundation for future growth.Cross-Functional Exposure: Get hands-on with GTM strategies, customer feedback loops, and content creation to engage potential clients.Flexible Culture: Enjoy a collaborative team environment that values creativity, learning, and innovation.Career Accelerator: Build a strong understanding of what it takes to succeed in the B2B SaaS space, especially in the early stages of a startup.
Key Responsibilities:Support the 0-1 GTM Strategy: Assist the founder in crafting and refining the go-to-market strategy, identifying potential customer segments, and conducting market research.Customer Success Insights: Engage with early adopters, collect feedback, and help iterate on our customer success processes to ensure satisfaction and retention.Content & Community Building: Create content around our startup journey, MVP validation, and GTM strategies to drive awareness and engagement on LinkedIn and other platforms.Data-Driven Decisions: Analyze campaign performance and customer interactions to identify trends and insights that can refine our approach.Outreach Support: Assist in developing personalized messaging for LinkedIn and email campaigns, helping to engage prospective customers effectively.
What We’re Looking For:Curiosity & Drive: A proactive learner with a genuine interest in understanding the startup ecosystem.Strong Communication Skills: Exceptional written and verbal skills, with the ability to convey complex ideas clearly.Analytical Thinker: Able to extract insights from data and feedback, and use them to adjust strategies.Adaptable & Resilient: Thrives in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment where flexibility is key.Background: Degree in Business, Marketing, or Communications (preferred). Previous experience in content creation, marketing, or customer-facing roles is a plus.
Why Join Dexy AI?Potential for Full-Time: High performers will have the opportunity to join the team full-time after the internship.Professional Development: Gain hands-on experience in building a SaaS product from the ground up.Collaborative Culture: Join a team that values your input and encourages creativity and growth.Ready to be a part of our journey from 0 to 1? If you're passionate about startups and eager to learn, apply now to join Dexy AI and make a real impact!

Skills:
Strong writing skills, Knowledge of anime industry, Creativity, Attention to detail, Research skills, Adaptability, Time management, Passion for anime,

Who We Are

At The Growth Mantra, were passionate about creating content that resonates deeply with niche audiences, and we know theres nothing quite like the enthusiasm of anime fans! Were looking to expand our team with a talented Anime Content Writer Intern who lives and breathes anime and manga, and can share that passion through engaging, well-crafted content.

If youre an anime enthusiast with a knack for storytelling and a desire to write for a like-minded audience, this role is perfect for you. Join us in creating reviews, summaries, and discussions that keep anime fans coming back for more!

Stipend: 8,000/month

About The Role

As our Anime Content Writer Intern, youll be diving into the world of anime and manga to create in-depth reviews, episode breakdowns, character analyses, and more. Youll have the chance to contribute to a platform that values creativity, authenticity, and a shared love for anime culture. This is your chance to connect with an audience that shares your interests while honing your writing and storytelling skills.

What Youll Be Doing

Anime & Manga Reviews

Watch and review the latest episodes, series, and manga releases, providing thoughtful insights that resonate with fans.Create summaries, highlight key moments, and analyze story arcs to offer readers an immersive experience.

Episode Recaps & Analyses

Write detailed recaps of popular episodes, covering plot developments, character dynamics, and standout scenes.Engage readers with insightful commentary and analyses that bring out the unique elements of each episode.

Character & Theme Exploration

Dive into character backstories, growth arcs, and relationships, bringing fans a deeper understanding of their favorite characters.Write thematic explorations that connect anime worlds to real-world topics, trends, and relatable experiences.

Trending Topics & Recommendations

Research and stay on top of anime trends, news, and upcoming releases to keep content fresh and relevant.Compile lists of recommended series, must-watch arcs, or anime highlights based on popular themes, genres, and fan interests.

Who You Are

Anime Enthusiast: Youre passionate about anime and manga, staying updated on the latest shows, trends, and fan-favorite topics.Engaging Writer: You have a flair for storytelling and can create engaging content that captures the excitement of the anime world.Detail-Oriented: You pay close attention to details, ensuring your content is accurate, high-quality, and aligned with fan interests.Creative & Analytical: You can break down complex plots and themes, delivering analyses that are both insightful and entertaining.

Bonus Skills

Familiarity with Japanese culture and anime genres.Experience with online platforms like WordPress or content management systems.

Perks & Benefits

Stipend: 8,000/monthRemote Flexibility: Work from anywhere with a flexible schedule that fits your lifestyle.Mentorship: Collaborate with experienced writers and marketing professionals, gaining hands-on experience in content creation.Potential for Full-Time: Outstanding interns may be considered for a full-time role post-internship.

Ready to Share Your Anime Passion?

If youre a writer with a love for anime and a desire to connect with fans through engaging content, wed love to have you on our team. Apply today to become an Anime Content Writer Intern at The Growth Mantra and share your passion with a growing audience!

Job Description: SEO Intern

Position Overview

We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented SEO Intern to join our team.

This internship will provide hands-on experience in search engine optimization, offering a unique opportunity to work on real-world projects and contribute to our companys online visibility and growth. The SEO Intern will work closely with our marketing team to implement strategies that improve our search engine rankings and drive organic traffic.

Key Responsibilities

Keyword Research:Conduct thorough keyword research using tools like Google Keyword Planner, SEMrush, and Ahrefs.Identify relevant keywords to target for different pages and content.Analyze keyword performance and suggest improvements.Content Optimization:Assist in optimizing existing content for SEO.Help create SEO-friendly content, including blog posts, landing pages, and product descriptions.Ensure content includes relevant keywords and follows best SEO practices.On-Page SEO:Optimize website elements including meta titles, descriptions, headers, and images.Implement internal linking strategies to enhance website navigation and user experience.Perform regular on-page audits to identify and fix SEO issues.Technical SEO:Support technical SEO audits and recommendations.Help with the implementation of structured data (schema markup).Monitor and improve website speed and performance.Backlink Strategy:Assist in developing and executing a backlink strategy.Identify and reach out to potential link-building opportunities.Monitor backlink profile and disavow harmful links.Analytics and Reporting:Track, analyze, and report on website performance using tools like Google Analytics and Google Search Console.Provide regular updates on SEO performance and suggest data-driven improvements.Monitor competitor SEO strategies and performance.Learning and Development:Stay updated with the latest SEO trends and algorithm changes.Participate in SEO training sessions and workshops.Collaborate with the team to share insights and learnings.

Qualifications

Currently pursuing a degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or related field.Basic understanding of SEO principles and practices.Familiarity with SEO tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs).Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Benefits

Gain practical experience in a professional setting.Opportunity to work on impactful SEO projects.Mentorship from experienced marketing professionals.Flexible working hours.

How To Apply

Please submit your resume, a cover letter explaining your interest in SEO, and any relevant work samples to hr@fosterideaz.com. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.

Join us and contribute to our mission of enhancing our digital presence while gaining invaluable SEO experience!

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Sharepoint

Teams

ERP

 Presentation skills: Consultants often need to present their findings and recommendations to clients and stakeholders. Strong presentation skills, including effective storytelling, visual communication, and confident delivery, are essential to convey information and persuade others.

About Websecure AI

Websecure AI is a pioneering company that integrates artificial intelligence with web security to develop scalable, secure, and intelligent applications. We are dedicated to creating innovative security solutions for the web, and we are looking for a DevOps Intern to join our growing team. If youre passionate about automation, cloud infrastructure, and optimizing development workflows, this is a fantastic opportunity to gain hands-on experience in a cutting-edge tech environment.

Position Overview

As a DevOps Intern at Websecure AI, you will work alongside our engineering team to help automate infrastructure, streamline deployment pipelines, and improve operational efficiency. Youll gain exposure to cloud technologies, containerization, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices, and monitoring tools. This internship is ideal for those looking to build a solid foundation in DevOps and cloud computing while working on real-world security and AI-driven projects.

Key Responsibilities

Assist in the development and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines

Help automate infrastructure provisioning using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation

Monitor and optimize cloud infrastructure on platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP

Support the deployment and scaling of applications in cloud environments

Troubleshoot issues with cloud-based applications and services

Assist in managing containerization and orchestration tools like Docker and Kubernetes

Work with the team to ensure high availability, security, and reliability of systems

Learn and contribute to best practices in security, compliance, and performance optimization

Collaborate with software development teams to ensure smooth integration of new features and services

Skills & Qualifications

Basic understanding of cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)

Familiarity with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI, or Travis CI

Experience with version control systems like Git

Exposure to containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes) is a plus

Knowledge of infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, Ansible, etc.) is a plus

Understanding of networking, security, and system administration

Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills

Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Good communication skills and attention to detail

Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field

Benefits

Internship Certificate

Letter of Recommendation

Performance-Based Stipend

Part-time work from home (2-3 hours per day)

5 days a week, fully flexible shift

For digital marketing internship in Kolkata, you will be working under the supervision of our Digital Marketing head to assist our digital marketing initiatives.

Digital marketing has become one of the most important part of modern-day marketing. These days one would be hard pressed to find a company which does not have a digital presence. Any company or organisation, at least has their official website and social media profiles in order to make sure that they can tap into digital channels and increase their revenue and sales. As such, digital marketing becomes even more important.

As a digital marketing intern, you will get hands-on experience of a live project and know the intricacies of online marketing. This internship program presents a very good opportunity to you as you get to work in a team of digital marketing professionals and content creators. Since we are also a stock broking company, you will get proper exposure of financial market as well, which can prove to be beneficial for you later down in your career.

Responsibilities for Digital Marketing Internship

Working with digital marketing fundamentalsCreating a proper marketing and sales strategy for the company to improve businessDevising innovative campaigns, executing them, and measuring their performanceOptimizing the social media performance of our companyWorking on PPC campaigns, Google Ads, and SEO (search engine optimization)Handling marketing campaigns

Qualifications For Digital Marketing Internship

Graduate from any fieldNeed to have good command over English, Hindi and BengaliMust be knowledgeable in SEO, SEM, SMO, PPC and all the digital marketing channelsNeed to have a good understanding of search engines, their algorithms and how they work

Duration: 1-3 Months

Location: Work From Home

Timings: 11 A.M.-4 P.M. (Mon-Fri)

Perks: The intern will receive a “Certificate Of Completion” from our end upon successful completion of the program.

To apply E-mail at: dm@smifs.co.in or call at: 7980093918

For more information you can also visit our official website: smifs.com

Once, you have applied for this program you just need to wait for sometime. If your profile seems relevant enough, then our HR department will get in touch with you for an interview specifying the time. After completing the interview process and if you are selected, you will be promptly contacted again and would be given the date of joining along with the initiation letter. Congartuations! you are now ready to start the internship program.

At the conclusion of the internship program, you would have good grasp and understanding of the concepts of digital marketing. Since, you would have worked on a running project, you will now be able to work on other live projects and your confidence would have risen enabling you to take on complex challenges and tasks which would be required of you.

So if you are ready to take on new challenges and want to learn more about digital marketing while working in a completely corporate environment and in a team of professionals, then you should absolutely grab this opportunity with open arms. It is not everyday that such an opportunity presents itself. So do not hold yourself to apply for this.

We also offer other internship programs in SEO, Social Media, Content Writing and more.

Education Criteria

MBA or Business Degree from a reputed university

What You Will Be Learning During Internship

We will also provide you with experience and knowledge of industry consulting practices during this period. Candidates will be working with real clients on live projects across the UK, Europe, the US and Asia.

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Advanced Microsoft Office 365 skills (Outlook, Powerpoint, Word , Excel)

Visio process mapping

Sharepoint

Teams

ERP

 Presentation skills: Consultants often need to present their findings and recommendations to clients and stakeholders. Strong presentation skills, including effective storytelling, visual communication, and confident delivery, are essential to convey information and persuade others.

Post internship information

On successful completion of the Internship, we will onboard the ideal candidate for Analyst / Managing consulting roles.

OUR STORY: 
In 2021, Novatr began as a dream at a tiny garage in the bustling lanes of Delhi. This dream was to empower every architect, engineer, and AEC professional with cutting-edge technology skills and help them realize their true potential. The AEC (Architecture-Engineering-Construction) industry is on the brink of a technological revolution, and we take pride in creating world-class, industry-relevant curriculums and innovative learning experiences that the world has never seen before. Founded by visionary architects and engineers, and backed by leading investors like Y Combinator and Powerhouse Ventures, we are fully committed to building the people who are building a better tomorrow. The world needs bold solutions and bold people to make things happen. Our mission is to empower every AEC professional through technology and innovative learning experiences. And guess what? We want YOU to be a part of this exhilarating journey! 
THE ROLE: 
Your Gig: Do you have it in you to be our Talent Attractor? 🚀
Your Mission, Should You Choose to Apply: 
● Sourcing and Screening: Assist in identifying potential candidates for various roles across Novatr, using multiple channels such as LinkedIn, job portals, and social media. ● Candidate Engagement: Conduct initial phone or video screenings to assess candidates' fit with Novatr's values, skills, and job requirements. ● Job Posting and Management: Create and manage job postings on different job boards and career platforms to attract top talent● Coordination: Assist in scheduling interviews, following up with candidates, and ensuring smooth communication throughout the hiring process. ● Database Management: Maintain and update candidate information in our recruitment database. ● Support Hiring Campaigns: Collaborate with the Talent Acquisition team to help execute various recruitment marketing campaigns. ● Onboarding Assistance: Support the onboarding process by helping new hires transition smoothly into their roles. ● Reporting and Metrics: Assist in tracking recruitment metrics such as time-to-hire, candidate pipelines, and conversion rates, providing insights to optimize the process. ● Market Research: Stay updated with the latest hiring trends, particularly in the EdTech and AEC industries, and share insights with the team. 
You’ll Be a Great Fit If You: 
● Are currently pursuing or have recently completed a degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field. ● Are passionate about talent acquisition and have a genuine interest in helping to build high-performing teams. ● Possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to connect with potential candidates. ● Are highly organized and detail-oriented, able to manage multiple tasks efficiently. ● Strong problem-solving skills and adaptability to fast-paced environments. ● Are familiar with recruitment tools and platforms (experience using LinkedIn or any ATS is a plus). ● Are eager to learn and are willing to take on new challenges in the recruitment space. ● Are a team player with a positive, energetic attitude. 
WHY JOIN US? 
● Exponential Growth : Contribute to the 0-1 startup journey and witness the remarkable growth of Novatr, from 5X to 500X. ● A Rocketship Career Path: Opportunities for rapid growth and career advancement. ● Competitive Compensation: Attractive salary with performance-based bonuses. ● Vibrant Work Culture: Fun, dynamic, and inclusive work environment. ● Perks and Benefits: Health insurance, team outings, free snacks, and more. ● Continuous Learning: Access to training, workshops, and industry events

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Websecure AI is a forward-thinking company known for leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) to create cutting-edge solutions, with a focus on web security. As we expand our expertise into the electric vehicle (EV) design space, we are looking for a highly motivated Electric Vehicles Design Intern to join our growing team. Position Overview

As an Electric Vehicles Design Intern, you will work with our product design and engineering teams to assist in the development and optimization of electric vehicle systems. Youll gain exposure to designing EV components, improving battery efficiency, working on motor and powertrain optimization, and utilizing AI-driven solutions to improve the overall vehicle performance. This internship is ideal for individuals passionate about electric vehicles and sustainable design, as well as those eager to apply engineering principles in an innovative and impactful way.

Assist in the design, modeling, and testing of electric vehicle systems (battery, powertrain, charging systems)

Help optimize power efficiency and improve the performance of EV components

Collaborate with engineers to improve the design and functionality of EV structures

Participate in the design of lightweight materials and advanced manufacturing processes

Assist in running simulations and tests for various EV components and systems

Contribute to the integration of AI and machine learning techniques into EV design and performance optimization

Assist with research and development on sustainable energy solutions for electric vehicles

Analyze performance data and contribute to the development of next-generation EV technologies

Strong foundation in mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, or automotive design

Basic knowledge of electric vehicle systems, including battery technology and powertrains

Familiarity with CAD software (e.g., SolidWorks, AutoCAD, CATIA, or similar)

Knowledge of materials science and lightweight materials used in automotive design

Basic understanding of electrical circuits, motor design, and energy storage systems

Experience with simulation software for vehicle design (e.g., MATLAB, Simulink, ANSYS)

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Ability to work in a collaborative, fast-paced environment

A passion for electric vehicles and sustainable design technologies

Currently pursuing or recently graduated with a degree in Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Automotive Engineering, or a related field

Internship Certificate

Letter of Recommendation

Performance-Based Stipend

Part-time work from home (2-3 hours per day)

5 days a week, fully flexible shift

Position: Graphic Design Intern, Immersive TrailsLocation: In-Office, Kolkata, West Bengal
About the Role:Got a knack for turning travel vibes into visual magic? As our Graphic Design Intern, you’ll be crafting designs that make our audience want to drop everything and hit the road. From Instagram posts to blog graphics, you’ll be bringing the spirit of each destination to life—one pixel at a time.
Responsibilities (a.k.a. What You’ll Do All Day):✨ Design eye-catching, on-brand social media graphics, including posts, stories, and reels—no pressure, but make it scroll-stopping.✨ Create visuals for blog posts, newsletters, and marketing materials that are so good, readers won’t even realise they’re learning something.✨ Keep your finger on the pulse of trends and come up with fresh, fun social media content ideas. (Yes, that means more than just “add sparkle.”)✨ Collaborate with the team to make sleek design templates that keep our brand looking sharp across all platforms.✨ Join brainstorming sessions where no idea is too wild—whether you’re suggesting llama memes or new color schemes.✨ Help manage content scheduling and social engagement—because a good post deserves a good audience.
Requirements (The Serious Part):🖌️ Graduate or final-year student who can make it to our Kolkata office.🖌️ Creativity and a knack for visual storytelling that can turn even a picture of a shoe into a compelling story.🖌️ Familiar with social media platforms (if you think “story” is just a fairy tale, keep swiping).🖌️ Basic skills in graphic design tools like Adobe Suite and Canva.🖌️ Video editing basics (InShot, Premiere Pro)—no Hollywood skills required, just enough to keep us looking fresh.🖌️ A passion for travel and digital content creation. (You dream in hashtags, don’t you?)
What We Offer:💡 Hands-on experience in branding and content creation.💡 A potential full-time spot if you dazzle us with your work.💡 The chance to bring your wildest travel ideas to life (within reason, of course).
Stipend: ₹5,000/month for 3 months (coffee, creative chaos and a potential full-time spot included!) 
How to Apply:If you’re ready to dive into the creative deep end, send your resume and any design samples (PDF format, please) to prantik@immersivetrails.com. Subject line: Application for Graphic Design Intern. Bonus points if your portfolio makes us chuckle.

About Intugine:

Ever wondered how the physical goods we consume every day (think dairy, snacks, or your favorite choco chip ice cream) reach you in time? Or how beautiful furniture or sophisticated electronic equipment and gadgets you use are delivered in the best possible condition at your doorstep.

Their journey spans from getting sourced, manufactured, and stored, to getting moved across a highly intricate supply chain network across the globe before it gets delivered. Global brands constantly face challenges like not having visibility of their raw materials, which delays production and in turn, delays customer shipments, or tracking shipments across various modalities and multiple geographies.

Intugine Technologies is one of the most trusted solution partners catering to these brands with its best-in-class visibility platform helping brands gain comprehensive visibility over their supply chain across modalities(air/land/sea/rail). Their solutions have helped eliminate operational inefficiencies, reduce logistics costs and improve OTIF, order to deliver TAT, and minimize dwell time and detention costs.

Intugine is a proud partner of the National Logistics Policy, an initiative by the Government of India. With this, it provides these brands with additional information via their integrations with FASTag, Port Community System, and Freight Operations Information System to name a few.

Today Intugine works with 75+ global enterprise names like GE Healthcare, Signify, Flipkart, Mahindra Logistics, Titan, Diageo, Ultratech Cement, Bridgestone, and GMMCO.

To know more, visit the website: https://www.intugine.com

Job Description

We are seeking talented and experienced Chatbot Developers to join our team. The ideal candidates should have a strong background in building custom bots using platforms such as Dialogueflow or IBM Watson Assistant, coupled with excellent integration skills across various platforms, including WhatsApp and web applications.

Responsibilities

 Chatbot Development: Design, develop, and deploy custom chatbots using platforms like Dialogueflow or IBM Watson Assistant. Platform Integration: Integrate chatbots seamlessly into various platforms, focusing on WhatsApp and web applications. Programming Skills: Utilize Node.js for the implementation of robust and scalable chatbot solutions. Rest API Development: Develop and maintain RESTful APIs to support chatbot functionality and communication with external systems. Custom Third-Party Integrations: Implement custom integrations with third-party services and applications to enhance chatbot capabilities. WhatsApp Cloud API: Leverage expertise in WhatsApp Cloud API to enable smooth and efficient communication through the platform. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including UI/UX designers and software engineers, to ensure cohesive integration of chatbots into various applications. Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing and debugging of chatbot functionalities to ensure high performance, accuracy, and user satisfaction. Documentation: Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation for chatbot development, including code documentation and integration guides. Continuous Learning: Stay updated on the latest advancements in chatbot technologies and implement best practices for ongoing improvements.

Requirements

 Proven experience developing custom chatbots using platforms like Dialogue-flow or IBM Watson Assistant. Strong proficiency in Node.js for chatbot development. Extensive knowledge of RESTful API development and integration. Hands-on experience with custom third-party integrations. Expertise in utilizing WhatsApp Cloud API for chatbot communication. Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Effective communication skills. A proactive and self-driven approach to learning and implementing new technologies.

If you are passionate about building innovative chatbot solutions and have the expertise to integrate them across various platforms, we encourage you to apply. Join us in creating cutting-edge conversational experiences for our users.

Job Description

Job description

Please fill in the form below to be considered for this role:

https://forms.office.com/e/UzuJspHGVF

Internship information

We are recruiting for Management Consulting Intern Analyst for various industries

Education

Healthcare

Life science

Media / Telecom

Retail

Hospitality

Utility and energy

Transport and Aviation

Automation

Aviation

Sustainability

3 Months of Internship Assignment.

After the successful completion of the internship, we will onboard the candidate into Analyst and consulting roles.

During the internship, we will validate the capability of the candidates for management consulting roles through various assignments.

Education Criteria

MBA or Business Degree from a reputed university

What You Will Be Learning During Internship

We will also provide you with experience and knowledge of industry consulting practices during this period. Candidates will be working with real clients on live projects across the UK, Europe, the US and Asia.

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Advanced Microsoft Office 365 skills (Outlook, Powerpoint, Word , Excel)

 Presentation skills: Consultants often need to present their findings and recommendations to clients and stakeholders. Strong presentation skills, including effective storytelling, visual communication, and confident delivery, are essential to convey information and persuade others.

Post internship information

On successful completion of the Internship, we will onboard the ideal candidate for Analyst / Managing consulting roles.

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Teams

About Company: Parliamentary and Administrative Research Institute (PARI) was established with a view to undertake meaningful research on parliamentary and administrative issues in India. In India, the relationship between the Executive and the Legislature is very, very demanding. Therefore, the Executive has to orient itself to the requirement of the Legislature, and at times, it has to adapt to the demand resulting in the need for reforms. Likewise, the Legislature also has to make amends sometime so that it becomes easier for the Executive to implement the laws passed by the Parliament. In order to understand the fine nuances of parliamentary procedure and practice and orient the respondents, PARI has brought out certain capacity-building courses on Parliamentary procedure, which enable the stakeholders to deal with the Parliament efficiently. The capacity-building courses are tailor-made for officers of the ministries/departments/PSUs.

Job description

Internship information

We are recruiting for Management Consulting Intern Analyst for various industries

Education

Healthcare

Life science

Media / Telecom

Retail

Hospitality

Utility and energy

Transport and Aviation

Automation

Aviation

Sustainability

3 Months of Internship Assignment.

After the successful completion of the internship, we will onboard the candidate into Analyst and consulting roles.

During the internship, we will validate the capability of the candidates for management consulting roles through various assignments.

Education Criteria

MBA or Business Degree from a reputed university

What You Will Be Learning During Internship

We will also provide you with experience and knowledge of industry consulting practices during this period. Candidates will be working with real clients on live projects across the UK, Europe, the US and Asia.

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Advanced Microsoft Office 365 skills (Outlook, Powerpoint, Word , Excel)

 Presentation skills: Consultants often need to present their findings and recommendations to clients and stakeholders. Strong presentation skills, including effective storytelling, visual communication, and confident delivery, are essential to convey information and persuade others.

Post internship information

On successful completion of the Internship, we will onboard the ideal candidate for Analyst / Managing consulting roles.

3 Months of Internship Assignment.

During the internship, we will validate the capability of the candidates for management consulting roles through various assignments.

Education Criteria

MBA or Business Degree from a reputed university

What You Will Be Learning During Internship

We will also provide you with experience and knowledge of industry consulting practices during this period. Candidates will be working with real clients on live projects across the UK, Europe, the US and Asia.

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Advanced Microsoft Office 365 skills (Outlook, Powerpoint, Word , Excel)

Visio process mapping

Sharepoint

Teams

ERP

 Presentation skills: Consultants often need to present their findings and recommendations to clients and stakeholders. Strong presentation skills, including effective storytelling, visual communication, and confident delivery, are essential to convey information and persuade others.

Post internship information

On successful completion of the Internship, we will onboard the ideal candidate for Analyst / Managing consulting roles.

Job description

Internship information

We are recruiting for Management Consulting Intern Analyst for various industries

Education

Healthcare

Life science

Media / Telecom

Retail

Hospitality

Utility and energy

Transport and Aviation

Automation

Aviation

Sustainability

3 Months of Internship Assignment.

After the successful completion of the internship, we will onboard the candidate into Analyst and consulting roles.

During the internship, we will validate the capability of the candidates for management consulting roles through various assignments.

Education Criteria

MBA or Business Degree from a reputed university

What You Will Be Learning During Internship

We will also provide you with experience and knowledge of industry consulting practices during this period. Candidates will be working with real clients on live projects across the UK, Europe, the US and Asia.

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Advanced Microsoft Office 365 skills (Outlook, Powerpoint, Word , Excel)

 Presentation skills: Consultants often need to present their findings and recommendations to clients and stakeholders. Strong presentation skills, including effective storytelling, visual communication, and confident delivery, are essential to convey information and persuade others.

Post internship information

On successful completion of the Internship, we will onboard the ideal candidate for Analyst / Managing consulting roles.

Hospitality

Utility and energy

Transport and Aviation

Automation

Aviation

Sustainability

3 Months of Internship Assignment.

After the successful completion of the internship, we will onboard the candidate into Analyst and consulting roles.

During the internship, we will validate the capability of the candidates for management consulting roles through various assignments.

Education Criteria

MBA or Business Degree from a reputed university

What You Will Be Learning During Internship

We will also provide you with experience and knowledge of industry consulting practices during this period. Candidates will be working with real clients on live projects across the UK, Europe, the US and Asia.

Along with this you will also be learning the below skills

 Problem-solving skills: Business analysts need to be able to identify and evaluate problems within an organization and develop solutions to address them. Critical thinking: This involves the ability to analyze information, identify patterns, and evaluate options to make informed business decisions. Communication skills: Business analysts must be skilled in both written and verbal communication to effectively gather requirements, convey recommendations, and facilitate meetings with stakeholders. Relationship-building skills: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with stakeholders is crucial for gathering accurate and complete information and ensuring stakeholder buy-in. Facilitation skills: Business analysts often facilitate meetings and workshops to gather requirements, brainstorm ideas, and resolve conflicts, so strong facilitation skills are essential. Data analysis skills: The ability to analyze and interpret data helps business analysts to identify trends and insights to support decision-making. Technical skills: Business analysts may need technical skills in areas such as database management, data modeling, or software development to understand and communicate with technical teams. Documentation skills: Clear and accurate documentation is crucial for capturing requirements, design specifications, and business process flows. Adaptability: Business analysts need to be flexible and adaptable to changing project requirements and priorities. Project management skills: Business analysts often work on projects, so having a basic understanding of project management principles and processes is beneficial. Technology skills;

Advanced Microsoft Office 365 skills (Outlook, Powerpoint, Word , Excel)

Visio process mapping

Sharepoint

Teams

ERP

 Presentation skills: Consultants often need to present their findings and recommendations to clients and stakeholders. Strong presentation skills, including effective storytelling, visual communication, and confident delivery, are essential to convey information and persuade others.

Post internship information

On successful completion of the Internship, we will onboard the ideal candidate for Analyst / Managing consulting roles.

We have 18+ years of experience collaborating with our clients to implement customized front-office solutions by leveraging industry-best practices, technology automation and our global pool of subject matter experts.

 Key Responsibilities: 

 Support clients across various industries by preparing pitch books, company profiles, trading comps, precedent transactions comps, and industry studies.  Conduct in-depth secondary research to provide high-quality analysis on projects including industry or market analysis, company reports, financial analysis, competitive benchmarking, and opportunity assessments.  Manage the delivery and execution of projects including memos, case studies, newsletters, broker/operational benchmarking, WACC analysis, potential buyer analysis, change of control analysis, and shareholder/ownership analysis.  Perform valuation analysis using income methods and multiples-driven techniques (Relative Valuation analysis).  Build financial models from scratch with detailed drivers, projections, and valuation.  Set up pre-results tables, earnings updates, earnings previews, comps, databases, and respond to client queries.  Maintain coverage of stocks in the sector and write research reports ranging from short to long formats.  Actively participate in team discussions and provide insights while monitoring consensus trends.  Analyze and spread financial statements on various financial spreading platforms, including Income Statements, Balance Sheets, and Cash Flow Statements of public and private companies for credit appraisal processes.  Review supplementary schedules, notes, and MD&A for detailed breakups and adjustments, normalizing financial statements for exceptional and non-recurring items.  Calculate Adjusted Net Worth, Recurring Cash Flows, Annual Debt Service, Contingent Liabilities, custom ratios, and other financial metrics.  Monitor covenant compliance and reporting, carry out credit reviews, finalize risk ratings, and prepare narratives/credit notes for credit approvals and ongoing monitoring.  Ensure 100% quality in deliverables, meet strict deadlines, and work effectively under pressure.  Contribute to managing project timelines and quality of deliverables to ensure high client satisfaction.

Excellent written and verbal communication skills  Highly motivated, ambitious, flexible and willingness to work hard
